mapinfo.detailsText:
From the foothills of Mount Everest to the cliffy plateaus where players spawn, the Himalayan Mountains provide an abundance of resources, a long winding trade route, and many chokepoints. Establish map control to keep the enemy from the central resources. 
 ---------------------------------
 
 Natives: Bhakti 
 Outlaws: Marathan Dacoit and Wokou Horseman 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 
 Map made by vividlyplain 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
